channel.title: Looking For A Source
channel.description:
I NEED A SOURCE! POINT ME TOWARDS ONE PL0X!
Hello, I quit RSPS coding and stuff a while back and am looking to get back into it again. I'm looking for a server source to start upon. I plan on making it a PK server, but I have some epic ideas etc. to add in. Basically, I'm looking for a clean PI with a bunch of stuff added, IE torva, claws, and all those newer items. There doesnt have to be anything but the source and the items...and a client to use or one that works with it. I repeat, please do not lead me to a source with a bunch of sh** added to it. Thanks in Advance.

item.title: Looking For A Source

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You can use the search bar or browse the Download Section.

item.title: Looking For A Source

item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

There are plenty of PI pk source’s look in server download’s section if your looking for eco pk then vistex v2 if just pk vistex v1 vistex is a advanced server for pi in my opinion…

Read full topic
